title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Feral Horses
body: Horses of Theodore Roosevelt National Park       The horses of Theodore Roosevelt National Park represent a huge attraction for many of our visitors. From this page, you can learn more about both the history and management of horses within the park. You can also learn about the horse adoption program sponsored through our partner, North Dakota Badlands Horse Registry. At the bottom of the page is a link to a photo gallery with several pictures of horses in the park.  Background and History Horse Management Adopt a Horse
